title: stuck authenticating
body: I just finished a game and then got disconnected from the client and it wouldnt reconnect so i hit "exit instead" and tried to log in again but now when I try to log in it just says "authenticating."  My friend says it shows that I am online though on his friend list.  Anyone else have this problem?  I've tried restarting my computer to see if anything went weird on my end but i dont think so.  Discord is still all good and not affected.

replies.body: Hey guys!  I dug into this and it looks like there are login issues impacting players in the West/Southwest (USA).   You may experience issues logging in or getting stuck at the authentication server.  Players who are already logged in should be able to play without issue.  I don't have anymore info right now, but I'll do my best to offer updates as I find them.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7qjAF9Z6,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-12-09T22:24:30.385+0000)
>
> Hey guys!  I dug into this and it looks like there are login issues impacting players in the Southwest (USA).   You may experience issues logging in or getting stuck at the authentication server.  Players who are already logged in should be able to play without issue.  I don't have anymore info right now, but I'll do my best to offer updates as I find them.  Hang tight!

I'm in Seattle WA - not in Southwest USA

Updated my wording!  It looks to be impacting players mostly in the west as well.  Trying to get info as it comes, it's a bit harder because it may be due to an ISP situation and not our servers.  I don't have full visibility yet, though.
Yea I have AT&T, the game also kicked me out

I was logged in, server kicked me out. Same with my IRL friends.

Oh, Centurylink here.
Same issue here in Tucson, AZ. Cox is the provider
I too am having this problem, south california, at&t?
My issue is just with the chat logging in seems to be fine with me.
Same issue here, not on AT&T, on CenturyLink.
Stuck at authenticating forever..... WHY CAN'T I LOG IN

So I've realized that when I am on my AT&T wi-fi I am unable to log in but when I switched over to my comcast I was able to log in.  I switched back to AT&T to see if it really was the wi-fi that was the issue and it seems like it is.  I was unable to log in when i switched back to the AT&T and then I was able to when I got back on the comcast wi-fi.
Yup, having the same errors. People see me online but am stuck at authenticating and then gives me an error

the first time i try to log in after closing and reopening the log in screen it says "an unexpected error occurred while logging in.  Please try again.  If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com."  When I try again it just sits at "authenticating" until i close the window
